title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta until al dente.
Whisk eggs with grated cheese and black pepper.
Mix pasta with bacon and egg mixture off the heat.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked.
Add chicken to the sauce and simmer.
Serve hot with naan or rice.

instructions: Heat oil in a wok and add garlic.
Stir fry vegetables on high heat.
